Waikato Hospital escapes: One Corrections staff member resigns, another on final warning https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-hospital-escapes-one- Corrections-staff-member-resigns-another-on-final-warning/QWV4LUTXY5E5PBDDYWOSUWSNPY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/waikato-hospital-escapes-one- Corrections-staff-member-resigns-another-on-final-warning/QWV4LUTXY5E5PBDDYWOSUWSNPY/ One staff member quit and one is on final warning after two escapes from Waikato Hospital. Tue, 14 Jan 2025 21:55:06 +0000 Spring Hill prisoner Damon Anderson, 48, escaped from Waikato Hospital by scaling down a pipe.

Photos / Logan Howard
